schema.title: 集成产品类型，CLOUD_MONITOR，LOG_SERVICE
schema.description:
集成产品类型：

- CLOUD_MONITOR：云监控
- LOG_SERVICE：日志服务

schema.title: 条数
schema.description: 每页展示的告警集成数。

schema.title: 是否展示详情
schema.description:
是否展示集成详情：

- true
- false

Total.title: 总数
Total.description: 查询到的告警集成总数。

IntegrationProductType.title: 集成产品类型，CLOUD_MONITOR，LOG_SERVICE
IntegrationProductType.description:
集成产品类型：

- CLOUD_MONITOR：云监控
- LOG_SERVICE：日志服务

State.title: 是否启用，true/false
State.description:
告警集成是否启用：

- true
- false

AutoRecover.title: 是否设置恢复告警事件
AutoRecover.description:
告警事件是否自动恢复：

- true（默认）
- false

RecoverTime.title: 恢复时间
RecoverTime.description: 告警事件自动恢复时间，默认时间为300秒。

Stat.description: 最近1小时总数及异常数。

items.description: 最近1小时总数及异常数。

事件映射，将源字段映射到目标字段。
固定字段映射，创建集成时默认生成的固定映射。
items.example:
[
    {
        "redefineType":"EXTRACT",
        "matchExpression":null,
        "fieldName":"alertname",
        "expression":null,
        "mappingRuleList":[

        ],
        "name":"告警名称",
        "integrationId":1234,
        "jsonPath":"$.alertName",
        "id":10001,
        "fieldType":"LABEL"
    },
    {
        "redefineType":"MAP",
        "matchExpression":null,
        "fieldName":"severity",
        "expression":null,
        "mappingRuleList":[
            {
                "mappingValue":"critical",
                "mappingName":"P1",
                "mappingType":"MAP",
                "originValue":"CRITICAL"
            },
            {
                "mappingValue":"error",
                "mappingName":"P2",
                "mappingType":"MAP",
                "originValue":"WARN"
            },
            {
                "mappingValue":"warning",
                "mappingName":"P3",
                "mappingType":"MAP",
                "originValue":"INFO"
            }
        ],
        "name":"告警等级",
        "integrationId":1234,
        "jsonPath":"$.triggerLevel",
        "id":10002,
        "fieldType":"LABEL"
    },
    {
        "redefineType":"EXTRACT",
        "matchExpression":null,
        "fieldName":"message",
        "expression":"{{$labels.namespace}} / {{$labels.dimensions}} 发生 {{ $labels.alertname }}, 当前值 {{$value}}。",
        "mappingRuleList":[

        ],
        "name":"告警描述",
        "integrationId":1234,
        "jsonPath":null,
        "id":10003,
        "fieldType":"ANNOTATION"
    },
    {
        "redefineType":"EXTRACT",
        "matchExpression":null,
        "fieldName":"value",
        "expression":null,
        "mappingRuleList":[

        ],
        "name":"告警样本值",
        "integrationId":1234,
        "jsonPath":"$.curValue",
        "id":10004,
        "fieldType":"ANNOTATION"
    },
    {
        "redefineType":"EXTRACT",
        "matchExpression":null,
        "fieldName":"source",
        "expression":null,
        "mappingRuleList":[

        ],
        "name":"来源",
        "integrationId":1234,
        "jsonPath":null,
        "id":10007,
        "fieldType":"LABEL"
    },
    {
        "redefineType":"ADD",
        "matchExpression":null,
        "fieldName":"generatorUrl",
        "expression":"https://cloudmonitor.console.aliyun.com/index.htm#/alarmInfo/name={{$labels.ruleId}}&searchValue=&searchType=name&searchProduct=/history/all/searchKey:{{$labels.ruleId}},startTime:{{sub $startsAt 300000}},endTime:{{$endsAt}}",
        "mappingRuleList":[

        ],
        "name":"事件地址",
        "integrationId":1234,
        "jsonPath":"https://cloudmonitor.console.aliyun.com/index.htm#/alarmInfo/name={{$labels.ruleId}}&searchValue=&searchType=name&searchProduct=/history/all/searchKey:{{$labels.ruleId}},startTime:{{sub $startsAt 300000}},endTime:{{$endsAt}}",
        "id":10012,
        "fieldType":"GENERATE_URL"
    }
]

items.description: 事件映射，将源字段映射到目标字段，拓展字段增加映射。

InitiativeRecoverField.description:
告警事件恢复字段。系统收到恢复事件后会根据恢复事件中的字段查询告警事件进行恢复。
> 仅日志服务支持设置此参数。

InitiativeRecoverValue.description:
告警事件恢复字段值。系统收到恢复事件后会根据恢复事件中的字段查询告警事件进行恢复。
> 仅日志服务支持设置此参数。

responseDemo:
[{"type":"json","example":"{
  "RequestId": "34ED024E-9E31-434A-9E4E-D9D15C3****",
  "PageInfo": {
    "Total": 1,
    "Size": 10,
    "Page": 1,
    "Integrations": [
      {
        "IntegrationId": 1234,
        "IntegrationName": "云监控集成",
        "IntegrationProductType": "CLOUD_MONITOR",
        "ApiEndpoint": "https://alerts.aliyuncs.com/api/v1/integrations/custom/ymQBN******",
        "ShortToken": "ymQBN******",
        "State": true,
        "Liveness": "ready",
        "CreateTime": "2022-06-18",
        "IntegrationDetail": {
          "Description": "测试",
          "DuplicateKey": "LABEL.alertname::LABEL.severity",
          "AutoRecover": true,
          "RecoverTime": 300,
          "Stat": [
            0
          ],
          "FieldRedefineRules": [
            [
              {
                "redefineType": "EXTRACT",
                "matchExpression": null,
                "fieldName": "alertname",
                "expression": null,
                "mappingRuleList": [],
                "name": "告警名称",
                "integrationId": 1234,
                "jsonPath": "$.alertName",
                "id": 10001,
                "fieldType": "LABEL"
              },
              {
                "redefineType": "MAP",
                "matchExpression": null,
                "fieldName": "severity",
                "expression": null,
                "mappingRuleList": [
                  {
                    "mappingValue": "critical",
                    "mappingName": "P1",
                    "mappingType": "MAP",
                    "originValue": "CRITICAL"
                  },
                  {
                    "mappingValue": "error",
                    "mappingName": "P2",
                    "mappingType": "MAP",
                    "originValue": "WARN"
                  },
                  {
                    "mappingValue": "warning",
                    "mappingName": "P3",
                    "mappingType": "MAP",
                    "originValue": "INFO"
                  }
                ],
                "name": "告警等级",
                "integrationId": 1234,
                "jsonPath": "$.triggerLevel",
                "id": 10002,
                "fieldType": "LABEL"
              },
              {
                "redefineType": "EXTRACT",
                "matchExpression": null,
                "fieldName": "message",
                "expression": "{{$labels.namespace}} / {{$labels.dimensions}} 发生 {{ $labels.alertname }}, 当前值 {{$value}}。",
                "mappingRuleList": [],
                "name": "告警描述",
                "integrationId": 1234,
                "jsonPath": null,
                "id": 10003,
                "fieldType": "ANNOTATION"
              },
              {
                "redefineType": "EXTRACT",
                "matchExpression": null,
                "fieldName": "value",
                "expression": null,
                "mappingRuleList": [],
                "name": "告警样本值",
                "integrationId": 1234,
                "jsonPath": "$.curValue",
                "id": 10004,
                "fieldType": "ANNOTATION"
              },
              {
                "redefineType": "EXTRACT",
                "matchExpression": null,
                "fieldName": "source",
                "expression": null,
                "mappingRuleList": [],
                "name": "来源",
                "integrationId": 1234,
                "jsonPath": null,
                "id": 10007,
                "fieldType": "LABEL"
              },
              {
                "redefineType": "ADD",
                "matchExpression": null,
                "fieldName": "generatorUrl",
                "expression": "https://cloudmonitor.console.aliyun.com/index.htm#/alarmInfo/name={{$labels.ruleId}}&searchValue=&searchType=name&searchProduct=/history/all/searchKey:{{$labels.ruleId}},startTime:{{sub $startsAt 300000}},endTime:{{$endsAt}}",
                "mappingRuleList": [],
                "name": "事件地址",
                "integrationId": 1234,
                "jsonPath": "https://cloudmonitor.console.aliyun.com/index.htm#/alarmInfo/name={{$labels.ruleId}}&searchValue=&searchType=name&searchProduct=/history/all/searchKey:{{$labels.ruleId}},startTime:{{sub $startsAt 300000}},endTime:{{$endsAt}}",
                "id": 10012,
                "fieldType": "GENERATE_URL"
              }
            ]
          ],
          "ExtendedFieldRedefineRules": [
            [
              {
                "redefineType": "EXTRACT",
                "matchExpression": null,
                "fieldName": "dimensions",
                "expression": null,
                "mappingRuleList": [],
                "name": "dimensions",
                "integrationId": 1234,
                "jsonPath": "$.dimensions",
                "id": 10013,
                "fieldType": "LABEL"
              },
              {
                "redefineType": "EXTRACT",
                "matchExpression": null,
                "fieldName": "expression",
                "expression": null,
                "mappingRuleList": [],
                "name": "expression",
                "integrationId": 1234,
                "jsonPath": "$.expression",
                "id": 10014,
                "fieldType": "LABEL"
              }
            ]
          ],
          "InitiativeRecoverField": "$.status",
          "InitiativeRecoverValue": "ok"
        }
      }
    ]
  }
}","errorExample":""},{"type":"xml","example":"<ListIntegrationResponse>
    <RequestId>34ED024E-9E31-434A-9E4E-D9D15C3****</RequestId>
    <PageInfo>
        <Total>1</Total>
        <Size>10</Size>
        <Page>1</Page>
        <Iintegrations>
            <IntegrationId>1234</IntegrationId>
            <IntegrationName>云监控集成</IntegrationName>
            <IntegrationProductType>CLOUD_MONITOR</IntegrationProductType>
            <ApiEndpoint>https://alerts.aliyuncs.com/api/v1/integrations/custom/ymQBN******</ApiEndpoint>
            <ShortToken>ymQBN******</ShortToken>
            <State>true</State>
            <Liveness>ready</Liveness>
            <CreateTime>2022-06-18</CreateTime>
            <IntegrationDetail>
                <Description>测试</Description>
                <DuplicateKey>LABEL.alertname::LABEL.severity</DuplicateKey>
                <AutoRecover>true</AutoRecover>
                <RecoverTime>300</RecoverTime>
                <FieldRedefineRules>
                    <redefineType>EXTRACT</redefineType>
                    <matchExpression/>
                    <fieldName>alertname</fieldName>
                    <expression/>
                    <name>告警名称</name>
                    <integrationId>1234</integrationId>
                    <jsonPath>$.alertName</jsonPath>
                    <id>10001</id>
                    <fieldType>LABEL</fieldType>
                </FieldRedefineRules>
                <FieldRedefineRules>
                    <redefineType>MAP</redefineType>
                    <matchExpression/>
                    <fieldName>severity</fieldName>
                    <expression/>
                    <mappingRuleList>
                        <mappingValue>critical</mappingValue>
                        <mappingName>P1</mappingName>
                        <mappingType>MAP</mappingType>
                        <originValue>CRITICAL</originValue>
                    </mappingRuleList>
                    <mappingRuleList>
                        <mappingValue>error</mappingValue>
                        <mappingName>P2</mappingName>
                        <mappingType>MAP</mappingType>
                        <originValue>WARN</originValue>
                    </mappingRuleList>
                    <mappingRuleList>
                        <mappingValue>warning</mappingValue>
                        <mappingName>P3</mappingName>
                        <mappingType>MAP</mappingType>
                        <originValue>INFO</originValue>
                    </mappingRuleList>
                    <name>告警等级</name>
                    <integrationId>1234</integrationId>
                    <jsonPath>$.triggerLevel</jsonPath>
                    <id>10002</id>
                    <fieldType>LABEL</fieldType>
                </FieldRedefineRules>
                <FieldRedefineRules>
                    <redefineType>EXTRACT</redefineType>
                    <matchExpression/>
                    <fieldName>message</fieldName>
                    <expression>{{$labels.namespace}} / {{$labels.dimensions}} 发生 {{ $labels.alertname }}, 当前值 {{$value}}。</expression>
                    <name>告警描述</name>
                    <integrationId>1234</integrationId>
                    <jsonPath/>
                    <id>10003</id>
                    <fieldType>ANNOTATION</fieldType>
                </FieldRedefineRules>
                <FieldRedefineRules>
                    <redefineType>EXTRACT</redefineType>
                    <matchExpression/>
                    <fieldName>value</fieldName>
                    <expression/>
                    <name>告警样本值</name>
                    <integrationId>1234</integrationId>
                    <jsonPath>$.curValue</jsonPath>
                    <id>10004</id>
                    <fieldType>ANNOTATION</fieldType>
                </FieldRedefineRules>
                <FieldRedefineRules>
                    <redefineType>EXTRACT</redefineType>
                    <matchExpression/>
                    <fieldName>imageUrl</fieldName>
                    <expression/>
                    <name>告警图片</name>
                    <integrationId>1234</integrationId>
                    <jsonPath/>
                    <id>10005</id>
                    <fieldType>ANNOTATION</fieldType>
                </FieldRedefineRules>
                <FieldRedefineRules>
                    <redefineType>EXTRACT</redefineType>
                    <matchExpression/>
                    <fieldName>check</fieldName>
                    <expression/>
                    <name>检查项</name>
                    <integrationId>1234</integrationId>
                    <jsonPath/>
                    <id>10006</id>
                    <fieldType>LABEL</fieldType>
                </FieldRedefineRules>
                <FieldRedefineRules>
                    <redefineType>EXTRACT</redefineType>
                    <matchExpression/>
                    <fieldName>source</fieldName>
                    <expression/>
                    <name>来源</name>
                    <integrationId>1234</integrationId>
                    <jsonPath/>
                    <id>10007</id>
                    <fieldType>LABEL</fieldType>
                </FieldRedefineRules>
                <FieldRedefineRules>
                    <redefineType>EXTRACT</redefineType>
                    <matchExpression/>
                    <fieldName>class</fieldName>
                    <expression/>
                    <name>分类</name>
                    <integrationId>1234</integrationId>
                    <jsonPath/>
                    <id>10008</id>
                    <fieldType>LABEL</fieldType>
                </FieldRedefineRules>
                <FieldRedefineRules>
                    <redefineType>EXTRACT</redefineType>
                    <matchExpression/>
                    <fieldName>service</fieldName>
                    <expression/>
                    <name>服务</name>
                    <integrationId>1234</integrationId>
                    <jsonPath/>
                    <id>10009</id>
                    <fieldType>LABEL</fieldType>
                </FieldRedefineRules>
                <FieldRedefineRules>
                    <redefineType>EXTRACT</redefineType>
                    <matchExpression/>
                    <fieldName>startat</fieldName>
                    <expression/>
                    <name>开始时间</name>
                    <integrationId>1234</integrationId>
                    <jsonPath/>
                    <id>10010</id>
                    <fieldType>START_AT</fieldType>
                </FieldRedefineRules>
                <FieldRedefineRules>
                    <redefineType>EXTRACT</redefineType>
                    <matchExpression/>
                    <fieldName>endat</fieldName>
                    <expression/>
                    <name>结束时间</name>
                    <integrationId>1234</integrationId>
                    <jsonPath/>
                    <id>10011</id>
                    <fieldType>END_AT</fieldType>
                </FieldRedefineRules>
                <FieldRedefineRules>
                    <redefineType>ADD</redefineType>
                    <matchExpression/>
                    <fieldName>generatorUrl</fieldName>
                    <expression>https://cloudmonitor.console.aliyun.com/index.htm#/alarmInfo/name={{$labels.ruleId}}&searchValue=&searchType=name&searchProduct=/history/all/searchKey:{{$labels.ruleId}},startTime:{{sub $startsAt 300000}},endTime:{{$endsAt}}</expression>
                    <name>事件地址</name>
                    <integrationId>1234</integrationId>
                    <jsonPath>https://cloudmonitor.console.aliyun.com/index.htm#/alarmInfo/name={{$labels.ruleId}}&searchValue=&searchType=name&searchProduct=/history/all/searchKey:{{$labels.ruleId}},startTime:{{sub $startsAt 300000}},endTime:{{$endsAt}}</jsonPath>
                    <id>10012</id>
                    <fieldType>GENERATE_URL</fieldType>
                </FieldRedefineRules>
                <ExtendedFieldRedefineRules>
                    <redefineType>EXTRACT</redefineType>
                    <matchExpression/>
                    <fieldName>dimensions</fieldName>
                    <expression/>
                    <name>dimensions</name>
                    <integrationId>1234</integrationId>
                    <jsonPath>$.dimensions</jsonPath>
                    <id>10013</id>
                    <fieldType>LABEL</fieldType>
                </ExtendedFieldRedefineRules>
                <ExtendedFieldRedefineRules>
                    <redefineType>EXTRACT</redefineType>
                    <matchExpression/>
                    <fieldName>expression</fieldName>
                    <expression/>
                    <name>expression</name>
                    <integrationId>1234</integrationId>
                    <jsonPath>$.expression</jsonPath>
                    <id>10014</id>
                    <fieldType>LABEL</fieldType>
                </ExtendedFieldRedefineRules>
            </IntegrationDetail>
        </Iintegrations>
    </PageInfo>
</ListIntegrationResponse>","errorExample":""}]
title: 查看集成列表详情
